text: Bi sond! Ewane ku rasthatina Yezdan didine derawderandine ziyan kirine. Gava dane rabuna hemuti ku ji wan ra niske va hatiye, ewan baren xwe ne (ji gonehan) dan eli ser pista xwe (aha) gotine: "Ji ber ku di cihane da kirina hinek tistan ji deste me dihat (me ji ewan nekiriye, idi kirina ewan tistan ji deste me cuye, sed) kovan ji me ra be." Hun hiuyar bin! Ciqa sike tista ewan hildaye
